items.content:
Hi Vincent,


Thank you for your questions. My name is Itay from the MPO LIVE team. We help advertisers go live on TT with CI to LIVE campaigns. I will be happy to answer your questions. 


The idea is to have a live of the festival broadcasted by the festival. But to monetize it we would like to work together with another advertiser. Are there any option to co-host a live ?

The is an option to stream the live content on more than one TT account at the same time. In this way, the live content can be streamed both on the Tomorrowland TikTok account and on the advertiser TT account. The advertiser can then promote the live stream on their TT account by running CI to LIVE campaign. 

To stream of both account, the production vendor will have to feed the live content into these two accounts. 

Alternatively, if the advertiser is not interested in going live on their own TT account, they can run CI to LIVE and drive traffic to the Tomorrowland TikTok account, despite it is not belong to them. The Tomorrowland account will need to approve this. 


If the live is done organically by Tomorrowland and ops, is there a way to sponsor it by a brand ? To include a brand on it ? (banner, etc)
Sponsorship a live stream by a brand is not something my team support. However, I know there is an option to include a costume commercial message in the live room that also have a sponsor logo next to it. This is a relatively new feature that required legal approval as well. Your LIVE Ops team might be able to assist you in setting up this costume commercial message and work with you on getting the legal approval. I can not advice further since my team (MPO LIVE) does not support this feature. 


Hope this info is useful. If you have further questions related this matter, please feel free to re-open this ticket and ask. 


Best regards, 

Itay

items.label: MPO LIVE helps advertisers go live on TikTok. Use this form to submit a question to the MPO LIVE team regarding live streaming on TikTok. This form is not for troubleshooting and bugs. For troubleshooting and bugs please use: Athena > TikTok Internal Tickets > Branding solutions > Livestream Traffic Solutions. ///Link to Athena Internal Tickets: https://vcp.to/atint
Question text

Are there any option to co-host a live ?
If the live is done organically by Tomorrowland and ops, is there a way to sponsor it by a brand ? To include a brand on it ? (banner, etc)
